Gavidya

The Numberless

Source Book of the Damned pg. 110
Pathfinder Wiki Gavidya

Details

Alignment LE
Pantheon Asura Ranas
Areas of Concern Corruption, indoctrination, lies
Domains Community, Evil, Law, Trickery
Subdomains Deception, Family, Slavery, Thievery
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Sap

Obedience

Count the bearings inside a sap, assigning each the name of someone you know and intend to indoctrinate or deceive. Gain a +4 profane bonus on Bluff checks to tell lies and on saving throws against divination effects.

Boons - Asura Ranas

Source Book of the Damned pg. 110
Over time, the mightiest of the asuras complete enough cycles of reincarnation and build upon the atrocities committed over multiple lives to incarnate into the most powerful of their kind: the asura ranas.

Asura ranas are lawful evil demigods that range in power from CR 26 to CR 30. Each asura rana detailed below is given an obedience, but the boons they grant are less complex than those granted by archdevils, manifesting as spell-like abilities usable once per day each.

1: glibness
2: create greater mindscape
3: microcosm
